question: [File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-aggregator/src/delayed_field_extension.rs] [Multiple Functions] [Read-modify-write atomicity] Operations like try_add_delta involve read-modify-write sequences - are these atomic in parallel execution, or can interleaving cause lost updates? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-aggregator/src/delayed_field_extension.rs] [Function: read_value()] [Recursive depth] Recursive reads via ApplyBase (lines 149-154) could be arbitrarily deep - is there a depth limit to prevent stack exhaustion and gas DoS? (High)
